title: New insight into the spatiotemporal distribution and ecological risk assessment of endocrine-disrupting chemicals in the Minjiang and Tuojiang rivers: perspective of watershed landscape patterns
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1360-1372
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00052H, Paper
Weike Zhao, Peilin Li, Bo Yang
This study evaluated the pollution characteristics, spatiotemporal distribution, and ecological risks of eight endocrine-disrupting chemicals (EDCs) in the Minjiang and Tuojiang rivers.
